name: Sword's Story
description:
A fantasy text adventure where you are a cursed sword, latching onto the souls of those who find you and manipulating their minds in order to get some freedom of movement. Made in Inform 7.

Can be played online here.

Can be played with the commands EXAMINE, TAKE, HIT, INCREASE, DECREASE, LIGHT [thing], WAIT, plus compass directions and up/down. A hint: try to interact with characters' minds.

Short; a couple of different ways to win. Walkthrough here.
